original_text: They came to Hilkiah the high priest and gave him the money that had been brought into the house of God, which the Levites, the keepers of the threshold, had collected from Manasseh and Ephraim and from all the remnant of Israel and from all Judah and Benjamin and from the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그들이 대제사장 힐기야에게 나아가 전에 하나님의 전에 헌금한 돈을 그에게 주니 이 돈은 문을 지키는 레위 사람들이 므낫세와 에브라임과 남아 있는 모든 이스라엘 사람과 온 유다와 베냐민과 예루살렘 주민들에게서 거둔 것이라

sentences.original_text: They came to Hilkiah the high priest
that had been brought into the house of God
which the Levites, the keepers of the threshold, had collected
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 문지기인 레위 사람들이 모은 것이었으니

sentences.original_text: and from all the remnant of Israel
and from all Judah and Benjamin
and from the inhabitants of Jerusalem
